values:
instead of using my linguistic intellect to beat around the bush ill spell it out, my friends don't comment on any of this shit in a helpful or insightful manner.  DUUHHHRHRRRRR WHO AM I GRRRRRR 

HAHA!
why do i bother doing this to myself?

the next time i see YOU, it would be too soon. i don't know why i bother trying to keep a friendship up there. its a chore to basically put up with YOU and YOUr life.

and every now and then SHE pops up in my head, and it makes me hate her more for being so deeply rooted in there. it was nothing but a child like infatuation, nothing more.

THEY have a relation ship that im slightly jealous over. And then theres even another one that makes me question what keeps THEM, together. Whats the fascination with shitty guys?

as the not as great as mitch hedburg, dane cook once said: it seems like when your not in a relationship, everyone else is in a relationship.

is it so hard to find good girls these days? signs point to yes, and the best one ive met so far is about 5000 miles west

**also added about 3 gigs of dance music to my collection**

here i am at beaches, a wonderful resort on the island(s) of turks and caicos. while a little familiar to the dominican republic, this place is actuallyt much nicer with warm pool water oceans with no waves. so theres nothign to do in the 2x more salt then jones beach water. unless you wanna ride on the banana boat.
the resort part is nice. free everything. EVERYTHING. i wake up to a straight shot of whiskey and drown my sorrows all day. an hour does not go buy without one of the splended mixed drinks in my hand. if you happen to be around, ill meet you at one of the 4 pool bars on the resort. as for my other daily commodities, the cigarette selection here is very low, so i havent had one since the day i left. also i have not seen anywhere where i could pick up some fine cigars either.
the worst part: im here with my family so it sucks alot. point done. i did not htink i would be able to have any fun with these people breathing down my necks the entire time. i was right, even when i do find some solitude, it only emphases my complete lack of anyone else on the island to hang out with. so for a day or so i put up with talking to my parents and all their craptacular activities.
Couple days ago i was chilling outside the lobby when i met this really chill dude (he reminded me of anthony kaloseah back home). we talked about bullshit for awhile and as it turns out, he isnt even staying at the resort. hes staying with this group of even more chill kids at this villa like right down the beach. parents are aircraft parts designers, so theyre loaded. they just come here for the free shit. clutch, i know. anyway, the past couple of night weve just been satying out late drinking smoking pot and enjoying ourselves. its these times where the trip feels alot more like it should, but theres only one thing that could make it perfect. if my friends were here with me.

i dont wanna leave.

i dont wanna come home.

fuck that shit all, ive once again, found my muse in the tropical paradise of the Caribbeans.

its not a question of how much fun i did have, but how better off i actually am.

Rebuild of evangelion is gonna get me hardcore into the fuckign series again. holy shit, it looks amazing. on top of that they are also planning out the lie action one. it might suck, but i really hope one of these remakes get the ending right. so far its taken them three different tries.

i finally saw waiting...

cheap to make movie. it was alright at best, but other then that it was kinda just a sub par comedy on the resterant biz. still glad i finally saw it tho, i can rest assured that there are some very minor similarities between the movie and Arturos.

did i mention i really like the walking dead comic books?

on a side note i started reading comics, and damn, theyre awesome.

read the Walking Dead, probably the best zombie/story driven comic out there.

While i rarely read, when i do find somethign to read that i actually enjoy, its really really satisfying. Harry potter, the zombie survival guide, label me however the fuck ya want, but I'd rather read about somethign that really captures my attention rather then somethign that i should read because it'd be good for me.

Wanted is a graphic novel i picked up at barnes and noble two days ago. I read it and loved it. I can almost relate to the book, my way of thinking and how i feel.

There are people that deserve what they get, and sometimes i feel like i should man up and just give them all a huge middle finger and a "Fuck you" spat into their stupid fucking faces.

its even been comign down to my friends that im just plain loosing faith in. its probably me honestly, being shaped from the mold of post high school life. a couple days ago i was whining about i dont know what i want from life, but now i feel the more appropriate now question is, why should i even care anymore? What do i care about, and how much is who or what worth to me? right now to help me put somethign on the second half is, im really feeling nothing. no push back. no response nothing.  Why should i care about shit if its clearly not top priority. Hell, i used to put people on top priority over my life and its worthless amount of bs. I fucking would tyr to do anything for my friends, and i cannot remember one time i ever turned them down within my power.

im feeling very: cold, bitter, alone, and very hateful.

ugh fuck you.

everyone is so selfish when it comes to college. Honestly, do all these people need to take summer courses after your first year of college? nah you really dont.
nope
no
dont need to


and i bought one of my buddies a nice gift for when he gets back! if he doesn't accept it im going to chop off his dick and feed it to him. thats how offended i will be if he docent take it.

The complete revampage of my basement is pretty much complete. Fucking stadium seating, fuckign surround sound, and a fucking bar. id post pics if it were possible but these entries are really for me anyways (nobody really reads em).

on a seperate note, im not content, but things are goign pretty well. I dont care that im at wcc anymore. its nbd. I have a group of people that i hang with and go out with. Not to mention being single is actually kinda legit. Idk, it depends really. Ive kinda taken up a whole withdrawn look on relationships. Fuck em you know? who needs em.

I may get an apartment with a friend next semester. just because itd be cooler to have my own place and not have to answer to my the whims of my rents. its all basically in the idea stage tho, kinda like going to south Carolina for college next year. (semester whatever).

At the same time, leaving would be a little dumb after i just spent like 300 bucks fixing up my basement. ahh wth. idk what im doing yet.

im getting really pumped for iron man to come out.

Linux Declared 'Hacker Proof'

March 30, 2008 10:51 a.m. EST

Jupiter Kalambakal - AHN News Writer

Vancouver, British Columbia (AHN)-- The Linux running on a Sony Vaio remained undefeated at the end of a three-way computer hacking challenge Friday at the CanSecWest conference.

Sponsors had wagered three laptops to anyone who could hack into one of the systems and run their own software. A $20,000 cash prize sweetened the deal.

The MacBook Air went first; Independent Security Evaluators' Charlie Miller took the Mac after about two minutes work on Thursday. Miller took home $10,000, courtesy of 3Com's TippingPoint division, in addition to the new laptop.

After two days of work, Shane Macaulay finally cracked the tiny Fujitsu laptop running Vista on Friday, with a little help from his friends.

Macaulay said the flaw he exploited was a cross-platform bug that took advantage of Java to circumvent Vista's security.Macaulay said he chose to work on Vista because he had done contract work for Microsoft in the past and was more familiar with its products.

TippingPoint Manager Terri Forslof said several attendees tried to crack the Linux box, but nobody could pull it off. She noted that some had found bugs in the Linux operating system but many of them didn't want to put the work into developing the exploit code that would be required to win the contest.


http://www.allheadlinenews.com/articles/7010483023

this weekend is kinda really pissing me off.

like right now, i wanna chuck my phone against the wall and fuckin murder some peeps if you catch my drift.
the basement is coming along so fucking well. i get so much stuff done when im bored as shit and not at work or school.

ugh im sick. this is lame beyond lameness.

FUCK'N SHIT

cut my hair, painted my basement, opened a bank account

i tell you im a whirlwind of change.

theres just somethign that ive been thinking about lately that i have to get out:

As much as i complain and bitch my way through my life which i always claim sucks, there was a short period in it where i felt like one of the most happiest and fulfilled guys alive. Even though thats now gone from me, i'm still lucky to have experienced a relationship such as that. In all honesty, i feel like i may never feel that way about another person ever again. In relating it to pole vault, the bar has been raised so high during that time, and no matter how much training i do, i  may never equal that height again.

I look on this perspective positively, because some people go their entire lives and never feel that way, and im one of the fortunate few who have.

I feel no hostility towards you, and I do respect your decisions. As for my faults, I apologize.

Merry christmas journal. its now 5 years ive had you, only writing in you about girls and depressing thoughts. Its what your there for in the end, because think about it, if i was having a good time, i wouldnt really want to waste any of it at the computer :/
The virgin suicides was on tv today. It was a pretty good movie.

Things are looking up for me.
Like id like to think so actually. Idk for sure. I hope its not some kidna illusion or anything.

I mean idk. Im confused but feeling better.


Despite the retarded school starting some shit with me.
i am so unbelievably pissed off right now. I hate college more then anything. And i mean seriously, get over your fucking self.
i dont even feel like talking about it anymore.
not being in a real college is making me fat.

Im tired of hanging out with my 'friends'.

IM also tired of sitting at home doing nothing at my computer.

That leaves me nowhere really.
And because im probably going to wcc, i have no chance of getting the fuck away from this place.

theres so much more i want to say to everone, but keeping quiet is easier.

besides i wouldnt know how to describe any of this crap anyway.
Ever heard of a self fufilling prophecy? You should have because your living one.

If you dont like what ive become, look in a mirror. I am a product of my freinds. 

Remember that the next time you decide to walk off in a huff.

Every fucking day, i feel like im wasting more and more of my life. Not to say thats its valuable, but i mean i fuckign work friday and saterday, and the rest of the week im in school and everyone does track. To the seniors and their projects and homework, seriously get the fuck out of here. Its like wo months before school ends. Your gonna blow off a beautiful day because you have some stupid paper to write? Im not asking you to fail but i mean common, write a shitty little bs story and get the fuck out of your house and get with your freinds. Christ kid.

A special thanks to everyone graduating for not spending their last days with people who actually matter. Give yourselves a hand.

Stopping by trak today just put me in this bad mood. Even though it was kinda nice out and everything, getting there and seeing all these people again, was just... wierd...

I dk exactly what it was but everyone seems detatched and idk what the hell is going on. I have no longer have freinds on the track team.
Today (tuesday) is a night before a snow day (wednesday) making it officially a friday. Im kinda pumped for snow, but today was only so so...

Beautiful. Simply Ravashing. Lovely.

All i know is that at this moment in time i feel safe and secure, knowing that yes, it does exist.

I love these tarot crads.

Laura and Jazz got together and pretty much bought me the most fucking insane awsome beast gift any wierd 17 year old caucasion male like myself could ever want. This gift will be remembered for pretty much the rest of my life and i cant ever give them anything to compare to how happy this has made me. I was pretty much in short of words to describe it, shocked happy.

Things are really looking good for me. I enjoy the people im with, and the activities we partake in. Maybe its the start of a whole new trend for the upcoming new year. Im going to put more effort into everyone else rather then myself.

Even today, i wonder the validity of a persons statement.

goddam me.

The times were good, the events prosperous. Till the black cloud engulfed the land, sweeping with it a dark and treacherous wind. For the people he once and cared for, had become corrupt. This blackness pummeled him but he pulled through. And then for a vreif moment, he looked back on the path behind him covered in glass and rock. He smiled and turend to the road paved in gold...

ok. i schedualed my fucking road test. so leave me alone about it ok. jesus h fucking chirst. i dont want to hear another word of road test, permit, licenses or driving in general. if you drive whoop de fuckign do for you, cause to me, driving is just another one of those things.

and so the 3 people who read this dont need to ask me at all, its on the fucking 16th of fucking june on a fucking friday. fuckers. your all gonna be the end of me.

its funny how thoughts float around in my head. no. maybe not funny. just strange.

You think of past experiences and say, i wonder what i couldve done diffrently, why did i do that, and why didnt i say this. I can create huge monologs in my head that would be fitting for any occasion, but when the time comes, and im put in the spotlight, i fumble around with my words, sounding like an uneducated idiot (i partially am) and no point gets across. 

i was home "sick" today. not really sick, but more of just a 'noones going to be in school, nothings going to happen id rather stay home and play half life' day.

it turns out a lot of my sickness over the past 2 weeks is stress related. fancy that.

i have an italian trip tommorrow which means i wont see anyone but a couple italian kids. 

i played counter strike and halo today. both left me with a sort of unfulfilled sense. cept that one game in halo.

last night, i felt great doing backwork. i felt free moving tables. i loved the two sony headphones inserted in my ears. I like having the music pumped so loud as to assure my timely deafness, drowning out the words of my coworkers. Steve drove me home. we stopped at the gas station for gas, cigarettes and bit-o-honey. we didnt go straight home. we talked and chilled. it was enjoyable.

i worked stright for 2 days, then came home, went to a bass lesson, and then out again to a communion. i got what i wanted when i became the top 5 in the counterstrike moc server fro a while, then the game ended. it was there that i shined. that one point in time, rewarded by my mouse pointing reflexes and intuition with an ak47 in the hands of my digital character. I took out the jeep today for a joyride. Top down, wind in my face. Nothing compares to merging with your giantg suit of armor traveling at 50 mph through the means of a simple clutch and stick shift. Its an experience i really like. now im so tired, my eyes tear with allergies. i have smelly hair, and barely managed a shower in the past weekend. 

simply put, im a mess.
i felt completely awsome after work tonight. nothing couldve brought me down. music is my savior.

i have uploaded so much music to the software that came with my cd player. theres so many cds that i own on my kickass computer now.

im deathly ill. for the past 3 days i havent uttered a word for sparing my energy to do more profitible things. like save my energy. to all of you who know me and my imune system of steel, i hang my head in defeat saying, "it has failed me"

heres something for the masses.
